name: 林少弘
objective: Tactics for TOEIC: Listening & Reading - Grant Trew
schedule:
Week 1: Unit 1 Listening Test Part 1 Photographs & Unit 2 Listening Test Part 2 Question Response

Week 2: Unit 3 Listening Test Part 3 Conversations & Unit 4 Listening Test Part 4 Talks

Week 3: Unit 5 Reading Test Part 5 Incomplete sentences & Unit 6 Text Completion

Week 4: Unit 7 Reading Text Comprehension

Week 5: Unit 8 Listening Test Part 1 Photographs & Unit 9 Listening Test Part 2 Question Response

Week 6: Unit 10 Listening Test Part 3 Conversations & Unit 11 Listening Test Part 4 Talks

Week 7: Unit 12 Reading Test Part 5 Incomplete sentences & Unit 13 Text Completion

Week 8: Unit 14 Reading Text Comprehension

Week 9: Mid-Term Exam

Week 10: Unit 15 Listening Test Part 1 Photographs & Unit 16 Listening Test Part 2 Question Response

Week 11: Unit 17 Listening Test Part 3 Conversations & Unit 18 Listening Test Part 4 Talks

Week 12: Unit 19 Reading Test Part 5 Incomplete sentences & Unit 20 Text Completion

Week 13: Unit 21 Reading Text Comprehension

Week 14: Unit 22 Listening Test Part 1 Photographs & Unit 23 Listening Test Part 2 Question Response

Week 15: Unit 24 Listening Test Part 3 Conversations & Unit 25 Listening Test Part 4 Talks

Week 16: Unit 26 Reading Test Part 5 Incomplete sentences & Unit 27 Text Completion

Week 17: Unit 28 Reading Text Comprehension

Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term Exam 50% (Listening 25%, Reading 25%)

Final Exam 50% (Listening 25%, Reading 25%)
materials: Tactics for TOEIC: Listening & Reading - Grant Trew
